original_text: And I will betroth you to me forever. I will betroth you to me in righteousness and in justice, in steadfast love and in mercy.
korean_text: 내가 네게 장가 들어 영원히 살되 공의와 정의와 은총과 긍휼히 여김으로 네게 장가 들며

sentences.original_text: And I will betroth you to me forever.
I will betroth you to me in righteousness and in justice,
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너를 나에게 의와 공의로 약혼시키리라,

sentences.original_text: in steadfast love and in mercy.
